languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс закладывает руки за спину и чуть наклоняется вперед.{/n} "Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус. При всем моем уважении — прекратите вести себя с аколитом Святой Инквизиции словно на светском приеме в кругу воздыхателей. Вы слишком легкомысленны для главы великой династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс закладывает руки за спину и чуть наклоняется вперед.{/n} "Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус. При всем моем уважении к вашему титулу и положению — прекратите вести себя с аколитом Святой Инквизиции словно на светском приеме в кругу воздыхателей. Вы слишком легкомысленны для главы великой династии".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс закладывает руки за спину и чуть наклоняется вперед.{/n} "Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус. При всем моем уважении — прекратите вести себя с аколитом Святой Инквизиции словно на светском приеме в кругу воздыхателей. Вы слишком легкомысленны для главы великой династии".

With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希背过双手，身体微微前倾。{/n}“恕我直言，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长，请不要像对待贵族圈子的仰慕者那样对待审判庭的侍仆。你这个样子过于轻浮，不适合领导如此辉煌的王朝。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希背过双手，身体微微前倾。{/n}“恕我直言，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长，请不要像对待贵族圈子的仰慕者那样对待审判庭的侍仆。你这个样子过于轻浮，不适合领导如此辉煌的王朝。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix junta las manos a su espalda y se inclina ligeramente hacia delante.{/n} «Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius. Con el debido respeto, deje de tratar a un acólito de la Santa Inquisición como si fuera un admirador en una función de la alta sociedad. Su frivolidad no es adecuada para liderar una dinastía tan ilustre».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix junta las manos a su espalda y se inclina ligeramente hacia delante.{/n} «Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius. Con el debido respeto, deje de tratar a un acólito de la Santa Inquisición como si fuera un admirador en una función de la alta sociedad. Su frivolidad no es adecuada para liderar una dinastía tan ilustre».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは両手を後ろに組み、少し前かがみになる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お言葉だが、聖なる異端審問庁のアコライトに対して、上流社会の催しごとにおいて、取り巻きに挨拶するときと同じように振る舞うのは避けていただきたい。あなたは高名な王朝を率いるには、あまりに軽薄なようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは両手を後ろに組み、少し前かがみになる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お言葉だが、聖なる異端審問庁のアコライトに対して、上流社会の催しごとにおいて、取り巻きに挨拶するときと同じように振る舞うのは避けていただきたい。あなたは高名な王朝を率いるには、あまりに軽薄なようだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix joint ses mains dans son dos et se penche légèrement en avant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} von Valancius. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, je vous prie de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à un acolyte de la Sainte Inquisition comme à un admirateur. J'ai peine à croire qu'une dynastie illustre comme la vôtre se retrouve entre les mains de quelqu'un d'aussi frivole. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix joint ses mains dans son dos et se penche légèrement en avant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} von Valancius. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, je vous prie de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à un acolyte de la Sainte Inquisition comme à un admirateur. J'ai peine à croire qu'une dynastie illustre comme la vôtre se retrouve entre les mains de quelqu'un d'aussi frivole. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix faltet seine Hände hinter dem Rücken und beugt sich ein Stück nach vorne.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. Bei allem Respekt, hört auf damit, einen Akolythen der Heiligen Inquisition wie einen Verehrer in feiner Gesellschaft anzusprechen. Ihr seid mit Eurem Charakter viel zu frivol, um einer so berühmten Dynastie vorzustehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix faltet seine Hände hinter dem Rücken und beugt sich ein Stück nach vorne.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. Bei allem Respekt, hört auf damit, einen Akolythen der Heiligen Inquisition wie einen Verehrer in feiner Gesellschaft anzusprechen. Ihr seid mit Eurem Charakter viel zu frivol, um einer so berühmten Dynastie vorzustehen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain  von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ellerini arkasında birleştirerek hafifçe öne eğiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan {name} von Valancius. Üzgünüm ama Kutsal Engizisyon'un bir havarisine yüksek sosyete davetinde karşılaştığın bir hayranmış gibi seslenmeyi kesmelisin. Böyle şanlı bir hanedanlığı yönetmek için fazla uçarı birisin."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix folds his hands behind his back and leans forward slightly.{/n} "Lord Captain {name} von Valancius. With all due respect, stop addressing an acolyte of the Holy Inquisition as you would an admirer at a high-society function. You are far too frivolous a person to lead such an illustrious dynasty."
